function.name: search_pubmed
function.description: This function will search for peer-reviewed clinical and biomedical research literature from Pubmed.

query.description: descriptive search query related to the biomedical sciences

function.name: search_arXiv
function.description: This function will search for open-access articles in the fields of Physics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Quantitative Biology, Quantitative Finance, and Statistics.

query.description: descriptive search query related to the physical sciences

function.name: search_clinical_trials
function.description: This function will search ClinicalTrials.gov to find current clinical trials being conducted or proposed.

query.description: descriptive search query related to current clinical trials
